code: import React from"react";var Filter=function Filter(_ref){var products=_ref.products,selectedGenre=_ref.selectedGenre,_onClick=_ref.onClick;var categories=["全部商品"];products.forEach(function(item){if(categories.indexOf(item.category)<0){categories.push(item.category);}});return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"btn-group d-flex",role:"group"},categories.map(function(category){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{key:category,className:category===selectedGenre?"btn btn-outline-secondary w-100 active":"btn btn-outline-secondary w-100",id:"cat-button",onClick:function onClick(){return _onClick(category);}},category);}));};export default Filter;
